summary: New Follower based on Camilla (AI) from the Riverwood Trader, but with fighting abilities  and  with two enchanted daedric daggers.
descriptionHtml:
[i]This is my first mod at all, so it's not very comprehensive. I started with a NPC/Follower because I wanted my very own NPC in Skyrim, especially because in my opinion, there isn't a really cool follower within the main game. The only two followers, I simply adore are obviously Serana and Lydia. 

The name of my NPC is Laura Kinney (Marvel Fans will recognize this name), although sadly there isn`t any relation to the Laura Kinney of Marvel!

I used Camilla Valerius as the base, to make my NPC, but in order to make her a follower, I had to change a few things. She is still an Imperial, but now has a fighting style and Bladesman Perk. She has two enchanted daedric daggers as weapons. She is a potential follower and a potential spouse, so you're able to marry her.



[b]Location:[/b]
You can find her at Companion base in Whiterun. 




[b]Used Mods to make the screenshots:[/b] 

Calientes Female Body Replacer: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/?
Sporty Sexy Sweat Textures: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946/?
Amazing Follower Tweak: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524/?




As mentioned, this is my first mod, so if you have any tips or advises, don't hesitate to post them. =)

[/i]
author: TashParker

files.name: Laura Kinney
files.changelogHtml:
1. Grey head bug fixed
2. Full dadric armor removed, so only the two dadric frost daggers are inside Laura's inventory
3. Haircolor changed: dark purple --> dark red
